blocker.description: Playwright MCP tools are not available in the agent's function list
blocker.details: While .mcp.json is configured with playwright server, the mcp__playwright__ tools are not accessible. Available MCP tools are: slack, supabase, n8n-webhook, zendesk. Without Playwright tools, cannot perform browser automation, navigation, clicks, or screenshots.
blocker.impact: Cannot execute ANY UI validation tests - all tests require browser automation

test_results.test_name: FE: Show remaining air tickets when balance is on hold due to booking request

test_results.notes: BLOCKER: Playwright MCP tools not available. Cannot perform browser automation required for this test. Test requires navigating to Employee Benefits > Air Tickets and verifying balance display during pending booking state.

error_log.details: Agent function list does not include mcp__playwright__ tools despite .mcp.json configuration. This prevents any browser automation from being executed.

recommendations: Verify that the Playwright MCP server is properly installed and running
Check that the MCP server configuration in .mcp.json is being loaded correctly
Ensure the Playwright MCP server is compatible with the current Claude Code version
Consider restarting the Claude Code agent to reload MCP configurations
Verify that all required dependencies for mcp-server-playwright are installed
